short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cycles between proxies randomly every 60 seconds.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows user to enter up to 4 proxy servers and randomly hop through them every 60s while extension is open. This extension has a really simple interface for no-frills configuration.
